data.text: Wach mokor kuom piny Ongoro manie dho Nam:
Kaneno magi to apuodora ka rem rama e ringra,
Chunya bwok, denda tetni nikech luoro;
Negiiko mesa mondo gimethi kendo gichiem,
Ka oneno geche lweny miywayo gi farese,
Ero ngʼato biro koidho gach lweny miywayo gi farese.
keluru pi ne joma riyo oloyo,
Ruoth Nyasaye wachona niya, “Mana kaka ja-otongʼo kwano hike achiel ma tije rumogo e kaka duongʼ mar Kedar norum.
Joma nok ma gin jolweny mag asere ma gin thuondi man Kedar ema notony. Jehova Nyasaye ma en Nyasach Israel osewacho.”
